title: Drawing, "Design for a Bread Basket", ca. 1810
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash on paper
signed: strip of reddish brown writing at bottom right
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Openwork wire bread basket in center.  The basket as well as the base are octogonally shaped shaped.  The openwork handle of the basket is laid down on the left rim. Fragment of writing in red lower right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Bread Basket", ca. 1810.
ca. 1810. Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-348.
